articles.title: Apple is Listening
articles.author: Marco Arment
articles.description: The trash can 2013 Mac Pro addressed only a fraction of the needs solved by the previous cheese grater towers, aged quickly without critical upgrade paths, and suffered from high GPU-failure rates from its cooling solution — all because its design prioritized size and appearance over performance and versatility in the one Mac model that should never make that tradeoff.
